items.description: According to Geojit Financial Services, The UN Food and Agriculture Organization's Food Price Index rose 0.5% on month to 127.5 points in November, reaching its highest value since April 2023, the organisation said in a report

items.description: The IPO includes a fresh issue of Rs 1,475 crore and an offer for sale of up to Rs 2,750 crore by BCP Asia II TopCo Pte Ltd. On the upper price band, the total mcap will be around Rs 16545 crore.

items.title: Live: Nifty gearing up for Santa rally after recent rebound? Paytm, Ceat in focus | Opening Bell
items.description: Indian benchmark indices Sensex and Nifty 50 are likely to see a negative start tracking cues from GIFT Nifty which is trading with mild cuts. The Indian benchmark indices ended with marginal losses in the volatile session on December 6 with Nifty closing below 24,700 after RBI delivered on expected line by keeping the repo rate unchanged and cutting the CRR to improve liquidity. At close, the Sensex was down 0.07% at 81,709.12, and the Nifty was down 30.60 points or 0.12% at 24,677.80. It will be a busy week as traders watch out for November CPI data and a flurry of big ticket IPOs like Vishal Mega Mart and Mobikwik among others. Among stocks to watch out for today will be Paytm, Godrej Consumer, Ceat. Catch Nandita Khemka in conversation with Kunal Rambhia—Fund Manager, The Streets (Technical) and Daljit Singh Kohli--Head -Equity, Roha Asset Managers LLP.

items.title: Welspun Corp shares hit record high as US plant bags new orders
items.description: "With an extremely positive outlook for the US market, the company is well-positioned to capitalise on future opportunities," Welspun said.

items.title: Godrej Consumer shares tank 9% after firm flags Q3 margin, volume growth warning
items.description: GCPL anticipates a 'temporary downward breach' in the margin the December quarter, from the normative range, amid subdued demand conditions and a high base.

items.title: CEAT shares hit record high as brokerages give thumbs up to Camso's Off-Highway Tyre acquisition
items.description: Axis notes that the acquisition, executed at approximately a 1x price-to-sales multiple, seems reasonably priced.

items.title: FMCG stocks crack amid demand slowdown concerns; Godrej Cons, HUL, Dabur, Marico fall 3-9%
items.description: Godrej Consumer's weak quarterly update, citing 'subdued' demand conditions in the economy expected to linger for a few more months, soured sentiment for the entire FMCG sector.

items.title: RITES stock surges 5% after order worth $97.1 million from Guyana government
items.description: The latest order win is poised to strengthen RITES' order book, further fueling its growth momentum. In Q2, the company’s order book grew 3.6 percent sequentially to Rs 6,581 crore.

items.title: ITI stock zooms 13% amid strong volumes; up 24% in a week
items.description: Over 4 crore shares changed hands in the morning, taking the total tally to a massive 12 crore shares in two sessions

items.title: Stocks on Radar: Welspun Corp, Biocon, Paytm, Bajaj Healthcare in Focus | December 09 Update
items.description: Stocks on Radar: Get the latest stock market updates! In today's video, we cover key developments from Welspun Corp's $7,000 crore order win in the USA, Biocon's US FDA approval, Paytm's sale of PayPay SARs, Bajaj Healthcare's TGA certification, and JSW Energy's solar and coal mine projects. Don't miss out on these important stock movements.

items.title: Mishtann Foods locked in 20% lower circuit for second day after SEBI's show cause notice
items.description: Mistann Foods share price slumped after Sebi's allegations of finding 'misrepresentation of large proportions' in financial statements by the company.

items.title: Buy Hero MotoCorp; target of Rs 5269: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: Geojit Financial Services is bullish on Hero MotoCorp has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 5269 in its research report dated December 06, 2024.

items.title: Uncertainty over US Biosecure Act weighs heavy on Divi's Labs, Neuland Labs, Piramal Pharma
items.description: The US Biosecure Act seeks to limit the dominance of Chinese players in the US biotech industry, creating new opportunities for Indian companies to expand their presence.

items.title: Lloyds Metals stock soars to record high after Incred initiates 'add' call, sees 40% upside
items.description: Incred's optimism about Lloyds Metals is driven by India's surging steel demand and elevated iron ore prices, factors that are expected to push the company's growth trajectory higher.
